title: When is the website back up for PBE sign ups
body:
When is the website back up for PBE sign ups
I really want to play and its been 4 months and haven't hear anything about when its back up
Do you have any idea of when the sign ups will be back up?

replies.body: At this moment we still don't have an exact date or time for when those PBE Signups will be opened back up. You can be sure to know by checking the [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) or the [**PBE status page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).
